publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3700 Maureen Watt: Operation Lochnagarâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police on the success of Operation Lochnagar in targeting and arresting street-level drug dealers in Aberdeen; notes that the operation is of exceptional scale and has resulted in numerous arrests over the last two weeks; commends the continued work of Grampian Police to make communities safer by going after those individuals who blight their neighbourhoods with drugs, and hopes, through the provision of a more visible police presence on the streets of Aberdeen, that members of the public will continue to help the police in identifying those involved in this evil and illegal activity. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Nanette Milne*, Bill Kidd*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Nigel Don*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-3700 Operation Lochnagar (lodged on 13 March 2009) Brian Adam*, Christina McKelvie*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3700 Operation Lochnagar (lodged on 13 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-3700 Operation Lochnagar (lodged on 13 March 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3700 Operation Lochnagar (lodged on 13 March 2009) Dave Thompson*
S3M-3700 Operation Lochnagar (lodged on 13 March 2009) Stuart McMillan*
